{
    "number": 191114,
    "data": "1,3,7,11,19,27,31,43,55,75,79,91,107,123,127,163,171,219,223,235,271,299,315,319,363,367,379,427,487,491,507,511,651,655,667,683,703,811,875,891,895,939,943,955,1083,1087,1099,1135,1195,1259,1275,1279,1451,1459,1467,1471,1515,1519,1531,1707,1947,1951,1963,1999",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 3x-2 and 4x-1 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A191113."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A191114/b191114.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 3; i = -2; j = 4; k = -1; f = 1; g = 8;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]  (* A191114 *)",
        "b = (a + 2)/3; c = (a + 1)/4; r = Range[1, 1200];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A191121 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A191152 *)",
        "m = (a + 1)/2  (* divisibility property *)",
        "p = (a + 1)/4  (* divisibility property *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a191114 n = a191114_list !! (n-1)",
        "a191114_list = 1 : f (singleton 3)",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (3*m-2) $ insert (4*m-1) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A191113."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 27 2011",
    "references": 4,
    "revision": 10,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:09-04:00",
    "created": "2011-05-27T16:46:43-04:00"
}
